content: This is our 10th GSoC! Students, please introduce yourself on the #Google Summer of Code stream, ask questions, and try doing the MGED tutorials on the website (under docs) -- that's just the basics, but will get you started and help you understand other terminology later.

Hello everyone interested in working on BRL-CAD under the Google Summer of Code! We welcome all skill levels and custom projects, but they must be scoped to your abilities and interests. Please introduce yourself at #Google Summer of Code if you haven't already. Everyone applying must submit a pull request related to BRL-CAD along with your proposal, and communication is essential. Lots of great ideas and talent, so keep the discussions coming.

Hi All, there is an opportunity for 2024 GSoC participants to meet with mentors informally to get to know applicants better and for anyone to ask questions. The meeting is scheduled for today (Thursday 28 March) at 1700 UTC and will be on Google Meet. The link to join will be provided about a half hour prior to the meeting.

And specifically if you are interested in coding:

https://brlcad.org/wiki/Developer_Documents
